hero.headline: Transform Your Outdoor Space with Campos Landscaping
hero.subhead: Expert landscaping and maintenance services to keep your property looking its best, all year round.

features.title: Lawn Care & Maintenance
features.description: Professional lawn mowing, fertilization, aeration, and weed control to keep your lawn healthy and vibrant.

features.title: Landscape Design & Installation
features.description: Custom landscape design tailored to your preferences and property, including planting, hardscaping, and irrigation systems.

features.title: Seasonal Clean-Up
features.description: Comprehensive spring and fall clean-up services to remove debris, prepare your landscape for the changing seasons, and prevent potential problems.

reviews.name: John Smith
reviews.text: Campos Landscaping has transformed my yard! Their attention to detail and commitment to quality are outstanding. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Emily Johnson
reviews.text: Reliable, professional, and reasonably priced. Campos Landscaping always goes above and beyond to ensure my lawn looks its best.
